verses.text: \w Then|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Pharao, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* possess, \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* stay \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Gessen.

\w Five|strong="H2568"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* also \w the|strong="H6440"\w* last \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w he|strong="H0376"\w* presented \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* king:

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w asked|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H0413"\w* \w occupation|strong="H4639"\w*? \w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w*, \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* sojourn \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* grass \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* being \w very|strong="H6258"\w* \w grievous|strong="H3515"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w orders|strong="H0559"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w may|strong="H4994"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Gessen.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* king therefore \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*: Thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w are|strong="H0001"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w best|strong="H4315"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Gessen. \w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou knowest \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* industrious \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*.

After \w this|strong="H0935"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w presented|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* being \w asked|strong="H0559"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w many|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w life|strong="H3117"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0834"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w best|strong="H4315"\w* \w place|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* Ramesses, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* Pharao \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* nourished \w them|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, allowing \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w world|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* want \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w had|strong="H0369"\w* oppressed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: \w more|strong="H0369"\w* \w especially|strong="H3966"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan.

\w Out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w gathered|strong="H3950"\w* \w up|strong="H3950"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* corn \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w bought|strong="H7666"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* king’s treasure.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* buyers wanted \w money|strong="H3701"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*: \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w presence|strong="H5048"\w*, \w having|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w Bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* food, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w exchange|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* asses \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* maintained \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exchange|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cattle|strong="H1241"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w spent|strong="H8552"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H8141"\w* \w gone|strong="H0935"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* art thou ignorant \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w bodies|strong="H1472"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w lands|strong="H0127"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1571"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*? \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* thine, \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w lands|strong="H0127"\w*: \w buy|strong="H7069"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* king’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, lest \w for|strong="H4191"\w* want \w of|strong="H5869"\w* tillers \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* wilderness.

\w And|strong="H4714"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H5704"\w* one \w end|strong="H7097"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* \w of|strong="H1366"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* other \w end|strong="H7097"\w* thereof,

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w see|strong="H2005"\w*, both \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H2232"\w* \w lands|strong="H0127"\w* belong \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Pharao: take \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fields|strong="H0127"\w*,

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* corn. \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w part|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* king: \w the|strong="H0834"\w* other \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w food|strong="H0400"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Our|strong="H1961"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w* \w is|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* thy hand: only \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w* favourably \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w we|strong="H4672"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* gladly \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* king.

\w From|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* unto \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w whole|strong="H3117"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2569"\w* \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w paid|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* law, \w except|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* free \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* covenant.
